items.sentence: Tom is probably the best student in this class.
Tom is the one who actually pulled the trigger.
Tom left the house without even saying goodbye.
Tom forgot to tell Mary what needed to be done.
Tom gave them a general idea of what he wanted.
Tom graduated from high school three years ago.
There is no way I\'m letting you do this alone.
Tom noticed that Mary seemed to be mad at John.
Tom opened the window to let in some fresh air.
Tom paused a moment to read what the sign said.
